document_data.mainbody:
Nesim Waladra was a monk of the late 15 century DR.
Nesim Waladra was the disciple of Leosin Erlanthar.
In the 1480s DR, Nesim Waladra was very concerned about Leosin Erlanthars well-being and whereabouts and requested help from an adventuring party while in Greenest.  The monk was wounded when Lennithon the blue dragon attacked the town with forces of the Cult of the Dragon.
